review: Its a cute little device. Sometimes the audio and video looses sync but for the most part it works well. Wish there was an Amazon prime video app for android phones but you cant have everything. For $35 its a fun device to mess around with but its not a replacement for real IPTV. I would go with a Roku.
author: Fizzybubbly

review: Incredible little device. There hasn't been something this amazing released in the consumer electronics space in years. You're looking at the cheapest major upgrade you can make to your home entertainment center available.You can stream any tab from Chrome on your desktop (including with HD video). You can have hours of fun with multiple friends on Youtube...everybody just queues up a video to watch one after another. Netflix streaming is awesome, although you lose the "playing next episode" feature on Chromecast.If you have a computer and an entertainment center, you need this little device.
